Package io.goobi.viewer.model.annotation

Class AltoAnnotationBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.goobi.viewer.model.annotation.AltoAnnotationBuilder
public class AltoAnnotationBuilder extends Object
Creates an AnnotationList of TextualResources from the content of an ALTO document. Depending on selected granularity, it is either one annotation per page, per TextBlock, per line or per word
Author:
Florian
